definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: full;—´[[מ]] Ge 23:9 + 15 t.; cstr. [[מְלֵא]] Je 6:11; f. [[מְלֵאָה]] Nu 7:14 + 20 t.; cstr. [[מְלֵאֲתִי]] Is 1:21 cf. Ges:§ 90. 3 a.; pl. [[מְלֵאִים]] Nu 7:13 + 18 t.; f. [[מְלֵאוֹת]] ([[אׂת]]-) Ge 41:7 + 4 t.;—full, abs. of ears of corn Ge 41:7, Ge 41:22; of value, price, Ge 23:9, 1Ch 21:22, 1Ch 21:24; of wind (= strong) Je 4:12 sq. acc. mat., bowls of fine flour ([[סׂלֶת]]) Nu 7:13, Nu 7:19, Nu 7:25, Nu 7:31, Nu 7:37, Nu 7:43, Nu 7:49, Nu 7:55, Nu 7:61, Nu 7:67, Nu 7:73, Nu 7:79; spoons of incense Nu 7:14, Nu 7:20, Nu 7:26, Nu 7:32, Nu 7:38, Nu 7:44, Nu 7:50, Nu 7:56, Nu 7:62, Nu 7:68, Nu 7:74, Nu 7:80, Nu 7:86; bowls of wine Je 35:5, cf. fig. Ps 75:9; houses, of contents De 6:l1, Ne 9:25 cf. Pr 17:1; cage, of birds Je 5:27 (in sim., v. infr.); cart, of sheaves Am 2:13 (in sim.) 1Ch 11:13, 2Ki 7:15; Ez Eze 1:18, Eze 10:12, Eze 17:3, Eze 36:38, Eze 37:1; as pred., of storehouses Ps 144:13; cf. fig. of Naomi Ru 1:21; of sea Ec 1:7; with art., of full vessel 2Ki 4:4; [[מְלֵאָה]] pregnant woman Ec 11:5; fig. full of blessing De 33:23; wisdom De 34:9; justice Is 1:21; commotion Is 22:2; fury Is 51:20; lies, etc. Na 3:1; wisdom Ez Eze 28:12 (del. ABCo); only twice in cstr. before that with which a thing is filled Is 1:21 [[מִשְׁפָּט]] ´[[מ]]; Je 6:11 [[מְלֵא יׇמִים]] (as subst.); as subst. in genit. (Ges:§ 128 n) Ps 73:10 [[מֵי מָלֵא]]; as adv. = fully Na 1:10, Je 12:6 (loudly, cf. Je 4:5).
